pages.text: Modifiers are fairly difficult to fabricate. Much of a modifier's circuitry consists of highly-sensitive logic processors that continuously compute and maintain safe tolerances for operational parameters. In order to facilitate a consistent and reproducible fabrication process, it is recommended that a $(2)Modifier Assembly Kit$() be used.
Unfortunately, due to the sensitivity of the circuitry, a high degree of variance is exhibited in the resultant modifier's modification factors.
